description: Table for various results (workcard isolates, workcard actions, susceptibilities) linked to a culture (organism) result.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the result record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LINKED_RESULTS_ID
columns.description: The identifiers for results linked to this organism result. On an isolate result record, this item will link to all organism workcards and all susceptibility tests related to that result.
